# <a name="empty-inbox"></a><span data-ttu-id="77fb7-102">Inbox gol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="77fb7-102">Empty inbox</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="77fb7-103">**Meu Outlook.com Inbox is gol**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="77fb7-103">**My Outlook.com inbox is empty**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="77fb7-104">Anumite programe de completare din browserul Firefox pot împiedica încărcarea mesajelor primite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="77fb7-104">Certain add-ons in the Firefox browser might prevent your inbox from loading.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="77fb7-105">Visit foc cină la spre learn la spre a nu fi de [acord sau Remove a aduna-ons](https://aka.ms/mozilla-add-ons).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="77fb7-105">Visit Firefox support to learn how to [disable or remove Add-ons](https://aka.ms/mozilla-add-ons).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="77fb7-106">**Vreau să-mi golesc Inbox**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="77fb7-106">**I want to empty my inbox**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="77fb7-107">Dacă doriți să goliți căsuța de e-mail și să ștergeți toate e-mailurile:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="77fb7-107">If you want to empty your inbox and delete all your email:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="77fb7-108">Selectați cercul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="77fb7-108">Select the circle</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="77fb7-109">de lângă [Inbox](https://outlook.live.com/mail/inbox) din partea de sus a listei de mesaje pentru a selecta toate mesajele.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="77fb7-109">next to [Inbox](https://outlook.live.com/mail/inbox) at the top of your message list to select all your messages.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="77fb7-110">În partea de sus a paginii, selectați **folder gol** (sau **gol focalizat** / **gol alte** dacă este activat Inbox focalizat).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="77fb7-110">At the top of the page, select **Empty folder** (or **Empty Focused** / **Empty Other** if Focused Inbox is turned on).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="77fb7-111">Selectați **Ștergeți toate**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="77fb7-111">Select **Delete all**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="77fb7-112">Pentru a curăța toate mesajele șterse, deschideți [folderul Elemente șterse](https://outlook.live.com/mail/deleteditems) și selectați **folder** > gol**Ștergeți toate**, apoi selectați **Recuperare elemente șterse din acest folder** în partea de sus a paginii și selectați **folderul gol** din nou .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="77fb7-112">To purge all your deleted messages, open your [Deleted Items folder](https://outlook.live.com/mail/deleteditems) and select **Empty folder** > **Delete all**, then select **Recover items deleted from this folder** at the top of the page and select **Empty folder** again.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="77fb7-113">Pentru mai multe informații, consultați [ștergerea e-mailului în Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/a9b63739-5392-412a-8e9a-d4b02708dee4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="77fb7-113">For more information, see [Delete email in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/a9b63739-5392-412a-8e9a-d4b02708dee4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)</span></span>
